feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 22, 05:00 - 14:00 UTC

Nov 6, 22:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/11/2023 05:00 UTC
End time : 22/11/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : A few seconds of I/O freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times)
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [SBG][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack S351B02
entry.content:
Oct 27, 22:56 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 27/10/2023 07:13 UTC
End Time : 27/10/2023 22:47 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : SBG1a
Root cause : Incident due to a problem with the cooling system of the S351B02 rack.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 27, 22:37 UTC
Monitoring - Update :Our teams have returned the last host affected by this incident.
We are monitoring this ticket to confirm that the incident has been definitively resolved.

Oct 27, 19:49 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 27, 15:48 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 27, 08:40 UTC
Identified - Start time : 27/10/2023 07:13 UTC
User impact : Some hosts are not available on the rack S351B02.
Technical impact : SBG1A
Root cause : Incident due to a problem with the cooling system of the S351B02 rack.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [BHS][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network Degradation Incident Notification
entry.content:
Oct 26, 13:28 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 21/10/2023 09:14 UTC
End time : 21/10/2023 14:24 UTC
Root cause : Post-Mortem will be published after incident closing
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 21, 15:24 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented by our technical teams to fix the network perturbations.
Since 14:24 UTC no more network perturbations present.
Our teams are monitoring the situation

Oct 21, 13:59 UTC
Update - Our teams are still working on fixing the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Oct 21, 10:24 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 21/10/2023 09:14 UTC
User impact : We are experiencing degradation on some hosts in BHS.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : BHS
Ongoing Actions: Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam backup
entry.content:
Oct 24, 21:59 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/10/2023 11:30 UTC
End Time : 24/10/2023 21:52 UTC
User impact : Our technical teams resolved the issue of Backup as a Service - Veeam Enterprise in EU.
Backup as a Service - Veeam Enterprise in EU and CA is currently available.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : EU & CA
Root cause : Software issue

Oct 24, 21:44 UTC
Update - Our technical teams resolved the issue of Backup as a Service - Veeam Enterprise in Canada and are still working to fix the issue in Europe.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Oct 24, 15:00 UTC
Update - After furhter investigation, the affected component is Backup as a Service - Veeam Enterprise not Backup as a Service - Veeam Backup Managed.

Oct 24, 14:47 UTC
Identified - Start time: 24/10/2023 11:30 UTC
User impact : The backup and restore services for all customers who have the feature Veeam enterprise in EU & CA are currently unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : EU & CA
Scope of impact : Veeam backup and restore impacted
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working actively on the resolution of this issue.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R802R20/R802R21
entry.content:
Oct 11, 16:59 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/10/2023 10:04 UTC
End time : 11/10/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in racks R802R20 and R802R21 were unreachable.
Root cause : Disjunction due to cooling module system failure.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 11, 15:56 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/10/2023 10:04 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in racks R802R20 and R802R21 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Disjunction due to cooling module system failure.
Related incident : Incident link
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to solve the problem of the few remaining impacted servers in rack R802R20 and R802R21.
Updates will be posted as significant progress is made
